CustomField.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL(RefundMethod__c, "PIX"), ISPICKVAL(RefundMethod__c, "IDEAL"), ISPICKVAL(RefundMethod__c, "KCB_RBT"), ISPICKVAL(RefundMethod__c, "KCB_ACC"), ISPICKVAL(RefundMethod__c, "Klarna"), ISPICKVAL(RefundMethod__c, "PAYPAL"), ISPICKVAL(RefundMethod__c, "Credit Card"), CONTAINS(OrderPaymentSummaryType__c, "APPLE_PAY") )
CustomField.label: Tech_AutomaticRefund_Button
